items.title: PHP Stan Passed (LumberMill)
items.description: Run `ddev composer run-script phpstan` to ensure Coding Standards are met (no errors or warnings)

items.title: Linting & Formatting
items.description: Ensure JS, CSS, and PHP are formatted and linted (`eslint`, `stylelint`)

items.title: No Debug Code in Production
items.description: Remove `var_dump`, `console.log`, `error_log`, and debugging functions

items.title: No Direct DB Queries
items.description: All database interactions go through WP_Query, get_posts, or WordPress APIs

items.title: Theme Production Build Compiles Successfully
items.description: Theme CSS and JS assets are built without errors (`ddev npm run build`)

items.title: Environment Variables (LumberMill)
items.description: Ensure all `.env` variables (for Bedrock or similar) are defined, and `.env.example` is updated

items.title: Caching & Deployment Strategy
items.description: Verify caching (object cache, page cache, CDN) and deployment scripts are properly configured `w3 total cache`

items.title: WP_DEBUG Disabled
items.description: Ensure `WP_DEBUG`, `SCRIPT_DEBUG`, and `DISPLAY_ERRORS` are set to false in production

items.title: PageSpeed Insights / Lighthouse
items.description: Performance score > 75, Accessibility > 90, Best Practices > 90, SEO > 90

items.title: SEO Metadata
items.description: Yoast SEO (or similar) is configured with meta titles, descriptions, and Open Graph data

items.title: Image Optimization
items.description: Ensure images are compressed (e.g., `https://wordpress.org/plugins/webp-uploads/`) and lazy-loaded

items.title: Permalinks & Sitemap
items.description: Pretty permalinks enabled, XML sitemap accessible and listed in `robots.txt` aka Yoast SEO is installed and activated

items.title: Clean URL Structure
items.description: Verify no unnecessary query strings or duplicate slugs

items.title: Secure Configuration
items.description: Disable file editing, hide PHP errors, enforce strong passwords, correct file permissions

items.title: HTTPS & SSL
items.description: Ensure HTTPS is enforced and SSL certificate is valid

items.title: No Exposed Sensitive Data
items.description: No API keys, database info, or admin URLs exposed publicly

items.title: Forms Have Anti Spam Measures
items.description: reCAPTCHA and/or WP Armour is/are installed

items.title: Cross-Browser Testing
items.description: Verify layout and functionality on Chrome, Firefox, Safari, and Edge

items.title: Responsive Testing
items.description: Test on mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports

items.title: Site Language Configuration
items.description: WordPress site language is set correctly in Settings → General to match the target audience region

items.title: Time Zone / Format Configuration
items.description: WordPress time zone and date time formats are set correctly in Settings → General to match the target audience region

items.title: Forms & Email Delivery
items.description: Test all contact forms and ensure emails are delivered (use SMTP or Mailpit if needed)

items.title: 404 & Redirects
items.description: Check custom 404 page and confirm redirects (301/302) are configured correctly

items.title: Search & Pagination
items.description: Ensure search results and pagination work properly on all templates
